languages.text: {n}Кассия озадаченно хмурится.{/n} "Теобальд казнил жену и единственного сына, лишь заподозрив их в измене Дому Орселлио. Отчего же благородный Эвейн... бросился спасать того, кто предал его династию? Разве дружба дает право совершать непростительные ошибки?"

{n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия озадаченно хмурится.{/n} "Теобальд казнил жену и единственного сына, лишь заподозрив их в измене Дому Орселлио. Отчего же благородный Эвейн... бросился спасать того, кто предал его династию? Разве дружба дает право совершать непростительные ошибки?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. Then why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

{n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

{n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

{n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

{n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

languages.text: {n}Cassia runzelt verwirrt die Stirn.{/n} "Theobald hat seine Frau und seinen einzigen Sohn auf den bloßen Verdacht des Verrats am Haus Orsellio hin hingerichtet. Warum ist dann der edle Evayne ... losgeeilt, um jemanden zu retten, der sein Haus hintergangen hat? Geben Freundschaftsbande einem das Recht auf unentschuldbare Fehler?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia runzelt verwirrt die Stirn.{/n} "Theobald hat seine Frau und seinen einzigen Sohn auf den bloßen Verdacht des Verrats am Haus Orsellio hin hingerichtet. Warum ist dann der edle Evayne ... losgeeilt, um jemanden zu retten, der sein Haus hintergangen hat? Geben Freundschaftsbande einem das Recht auf unentschuldbare Fehler?"

languages.text: {n}Visiblement confuse, Cassia fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Théobald a exécuté sa femme et son fils unique parce qu'il les soupçonnait de comploter contre la maison Orsellio. Alors pourquoi le noble Evayne... se précipiterait-il pour sauver quelqu'un qui a trahi sa maison ? Les liens de l'amitié donnent-ils le droit de commettre des erreurs inexcusables ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Visiblement confuse, Cassia fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Théobald a exécuté sa femme et son fils unique parce qu'il les soupçonnait de comploter contre la maison Orsellio. Alors pourquoi le noble Evayne... se précipiterait-il pour sauver quelqu'un qui a trahi sa maison ? Les liens de l'amitié donnent-ils le droit de commettre des erreurs inexcusables ? »

languages.text: {n}卡西娅困惑地皱起了眉头。{/n}“西奥巴德仅仅是由于怀疑自己的妻子与独子背叛了奥赛罗贵族，便下令处死了他们。既然如此，为什么高贵的艾维尼会……这么急着拯救家族的叛徒？难道有了友谊的纽带，就可以原谅那些犯下不可原谅过错的人吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅困惑地皱起了眉头。{/n}“西奥巴德仅仅是由于怀疑自己的妻子与独子背叛了奥塞罗贵族，便下令处死了他们。既然如此，为什么高贵的艾维尼会……这么急着拯救家族的叛徒？难道有了友谊的纽带，就可以原谅那些犯下不可原谅过错的人吗？”

languages.text: {n}カシアは混乱した様子で顔をしかめる。{/n}「シオボールドは、オーセリオ家に対する反逆の疑いだけで、妻と一人息子を処刑しました。ではなぜ貴族たるエヴァインは…自分の家を裏切った人物を救おうとしたのでしょうか？友情の絆は、許されない過ちを犯す権利を与えるのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは混乱した様子で顔をしかめる。{/n}「テオバルドは、ただオーセリオ家への謀反の疑いがあるというだけで、妻と一人息子を処刑しました。ではなぜ聖エヴァインは…自分の家を裏切った者を助けようとしたのです？絆や友情があるというだけで、弁明不能の過ちを犯す権利を与えられるとでもいうのでしょうか？」
{n}カシアは混乱した様子で顔をしかめる。{/n}「シオボールドは、オーセリオ家に対する反逆の疑いだけで、妻と一人息子を処刑しました。ではなぜ貴族たるエヴァインは…自分の家を裏切った人物を救おうとしたのでしょうか？友情の絆は、許されない過ちを犯す権利を与えるのでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, confusa.{/n} «Theobald ejecutó a su esposa y a su único hijo por la simple sospecha de traición hacia la casa Orsellio. Así que, ¿por qué el noble Evayne ansiaría tanto salvar a alguien que ha traicionado a su casa? ¿Los lazos de amistad dan derecho a cometer tales errores inexcusables?».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, confusa.{/n} «Theobald ejecutó a su esposa y a su único hijo por la simple sospecha de traición hacia la casa Orsellio. Así que, ¿por qué el noble Evayne ansiaría tanto salvar a alguien que ha traicionado a su casa? ¿Los lazos de amistad dan derecho a cometer tales errores inexcusables?».

languages.text: {n}Cassia şaşkınlıkla kaş çatıyor.{/n} "Theobald, zamanında sırf Orsellio Hanesi'ne ihanet ettiklerinden şüphelenip karısını ve tek oğlunu infaz ettirmişti. Böyle bir durumda soylu Evayne... Neden hanesine ihanet eden birini kurtarmaya çalışsın? Dostluk bağları, kişiye mazur görülemez hatalar yapma hakkı verir mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns in confusion.{/n} "Theobald executed his wife and only son on the mere suspicion of treason against House Orsellio. So why did the noble Evayne... rush to save someone who had betrayed his house? Do bonds of friendship give one the right to make inexcusable mistakes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia şaşkınlıkla kaş çatıyor.{/n} "Theobald, zamanında sırf Orsellio Hanesi'ne ihanet ettiklerinden şüphelenip karısını ve tek oğlunu infaz ettirmişti. Böyle bir durumda soylu Evayne... Neden hanesine ihanet eden birini kurtarmaya çalışsın? Dostluk bağları, kişiye mazur görülemez hatalar yapma hakkı verir mi?"
